text: wznn hwla' aleusat 'ana allah ln yakhudhahum bialeadhab jaza'an esyanhm weutuwwihm, fmdu fi shhwathm, wemuu ean alhudaa falam ybsrwh, wsammu ean smae alhqq falam yntfeu bh, fa'anzal allah bihim bash, ftabu fatab allah elyhm, thuma eami kthyr mnhm, wsmmu, baedama tabayan lahum alhqqu, wallah basir baemalhm khyrha wshrha wsyjazyhm elyha
